Reviews.Title: HTC Droid
Reviews.Author: Meek Meek
Reviews.Content: Great!!!!!! I was really satisfied with this phone. It's everything the description said it would be!! It came sooner than I thought and I activated it at my local Page Plus dealer .

Reviews.Title: HTC Droid Incredible 2 - Second time around... and the replacement phone has been excellent
Reviews.Author: RatherLiveInKeyWest
Reviews.Content: Upgraded my Verizon Wireless phone mid-2011 to the HTC Incredible 2 and had issues right away with lack of signal strength and volume... tried for a couple weeks but it just sucked, so I called VZW and they promptly sent a replacement.The replacement has been fantastic. Easy to use, great virtual keyboard/touchscreen alignment, plenty of pages to store apps on, and excellent battery life. Battery life was initially nothing to write home about, but I'd used the Easy Battery Saver app before and installed it pronto -- now the battery lasts an average of 2 to 2 1/4 days (usage depending of course). Out of the box I was probably just barely getting through the day.Prior to this phone I had a Motorola Droid 2, Droid, and an HTC Eris and I like the Incredible 2 the best of them all . The Droids were nice, but they were heavy and clunky. The Eris was nice until an Android software update essentially destroyed its virtual keyboard to touchscreen alignment.This Incredible 2 is thin enough for me, lightweight compared to the others I had, and the screens are totally easy to use. Text is very simple, and email setup was a breeze. It works perfectly with Google Navigator and I have even lost my Garmin GPS having not used it since getting this phone.How could it be better? Well, it does come preloaded with apps that you can't get rid of like Verizon Navigator, Skype, Slacker Radio, Books, Facebook, Flickr, Amazon Kindle, NFL Mobile, Peep, YouTube and other byte stealers that I really do not care about using on my phone... would be nice to be able to delete them altogether, but hiding them works OK too.I like and recommend this phone, but suggest that you get very aggressive right away with VZW Customer Service if you get a lemon and hopefully they would treat you like they did me and send a replacement that was outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: Perfect!! Fast Shipment! Excellent Camera and apps!! Super long battery life! Love the color and all clearness of the screen!

Reviews.Title: great phone at a great price!
Reviews.Author: melanie
Reviews.Content: The phone is very pleasing to the eye, slim, lovely colour, and easy to use.  Excellent price and a great value. It is my first smart phone, and I was wary about learning how to use it,  but now that I have,  I don't know how I ever got by without it.  My girlfriend has an Iphone 5,  but likes my HTC better!

Reviews.Author: Mia
Reviews.Content: Sweet phone. Easy to use, I love it. The screen is very spacious too. I like the screen tilt auto adjust feature.

Reviews.Title: Excellente cell phone!
Reviews.Author: Gwendolyn Terrazas
Reviews.Content: Absolutely loved this cell phone.  It was woth the buy.  Easy to use and good quality.  Would recommend it to others!

Reviews.Title: faulty charger ports
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I had this phone less than a year when it stopped charging. I got a replacement n 5 months later, it stopped charging again. I am beyond frustrated because I took it to a cell phone repair place. . . No luck. The charger ports are faulty. I won't buy this phone again.

Reviews.Title: DEFECTIVE!!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I had ordered this phone with a 2 year contract 11 months ago. I had to replace the phone after only 8 months because of a defective charging port. When I brought the phone to my local Verizon store, they basically told me that it is an extremely common problem with the Incredible 2. After only having the replacement phone for 3 months, the same problem happened and I have to get ANOTHER replacement!! This is 2 replacment phones and I'm less than a year into my contract! I am stuck with this phone for another year, I will most likely have to replace it a couple more times by then. PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE!!!

Reviews.Title: HTC Droid Incredible 2
Reviews.Author: Tammy Porter
Reviews.Content: I received it very quickly.  I love it.  And even though it said it was new, I wasn't sure if new meant brand new and I was so excited that new was BRAND New!  Thanks so much for offering this at a low price.  I bought a refurbished one two months ago for alot more and it just didn't last, so I was glad that this was was new and cheaper.  Thanks again!

Reviews.Title: my concerns
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: The phone is great love the apps love how it look.But I had to pay to get the phone unlock the signal is terrible it makes me frustrated and the charger port is faulty.but besides that it is incredible.

Reviews.Title: Love my new phone
Reviews.Author: chantelle brown
Reviews.Content: I dropped my other droid in the toilet and bought this one to replace it.  It works beautifully.  Couldn't have asked for a better replacement.

Reviews.Title: Best phone ever
Reviews.Author: BK_Jol
Reviews.Content: This is the second HTC Incredible 2 for my family. So far no other phone (Android or otherwise) has offered the performance or dependability. Like the interface, capabilities and form factor. Battery life is good also.

Reviews.Title: VERY UNHAPPY WITH MY PHONE
Reviews.Author: 2HonorHim
Reviews.Content: I received this phone today and was very excited to activate it only to find out that Verizon says it is a none pay phone. Meaning someone bought this phone and never paid for it. It did not come with a SIM card either. I am trying to contact this seller. I want a complete refund!

Reviews.Title: great phone. few things bad but not much
Reviews.Author: Nahari Stewart
Reviews.Content: Phone is good. It freezes at times. Great multi-tasking phone.Great for teens and adults. The phone also has great shortcuts to apps like Facebook, tweeter and others.

Reviews.Title: Good company to do business with...
Reviews.Author: Andrea Gordon
Reviews.Content: I love the basic phone, although there are a couple of quirks with it that I did not expect. But I am extremely happy with the company - there was a small glitch in the order and the manager immediately rectified and provided extra service in response.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for a first smart phone.
Reviews.Author: Ellen R Waske
Reviews.Content: Don't have anything to compare this to as it is my first smart phone.  Occasionally freezes up.  Frequently adjust ring volume unintentionally as the button is on the side of the phone right where I pick it up. When typing messages, the A key and the 1 key often don't work until I switch the phone from vertical to horizontal or vice versa.  Sound quality is very good. Camera quality is excellent although it's very hard to see the screen in bright light. Overall, I'm happy with the phone and will probably keep it for quite a while.

Reviews.Title: excellent device
Reviews.Author: victor veloz
Reviews.Content: excellent device, beautiful red, the software works great, fast and fluid, not frozen, only 4 stars because it comes unlocked!

Reviews.Title: Nice.....
Reviews.Author: James F Crandall
Reviews.Content: I hated my iPhone 4S. I loved my Droid X and turned it back on and gave away my iPhone to a friend. My Droid was old and acting slow so i ordered this phone. I still have over a year to renew my Verizon contract, so this phone worked perfect. I don't like that the technology is older, but it serves it's purpose. I like that most times it doesn't take forever to turn on. It turns right on and I can use it right away. i will stick to a droid phone or something similar when I renew with Verizon, if I stay with them.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Tori
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. It takes great pictures. Has great battery life. Dont need to charge it much. I like it especially for its color.

Reviews.Title: very,very good.
Reviews.Author: carlton
Reviews.Content: this item came in good time and looked brand new in good box with everything,only problem was i thought i could have unlocked it but i couldn't. so i cant use it,but if i could have, i would have been excessively pleased and happy.this is an update,i am so happy with my phone i had to change my rating,its a beautiful and bright phone,takes the best pictures back and front camera,bought some cases for it this phone is the best,no regrets,battery life is quite short but still fine,love this phone.....

Reviews.Title: THIS PHONE WAS OK
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Raymond
Reviews.Content: THIS MAKES ME REALIZE WHY I ONLY STICK WITH IPHONES OR NEWER ANDROIDS. PHONE ITSELF WAS FINE BUT DEF. NEED A HI TECH PHONE!

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Maxine
Reviews.Content: The cell phone didn't work properly. End up getting a new phone a month later. Waste of money. Don't Buy

Reviews.Title: Phone works good but battery life is not so good.
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: The product was in great condition and came on time. the phone worked fine but the battery didn't hold a charge. That was the only reason I rated it 3 stars. The seller responded to my questions quickly. I was able to return it without any issues.

Reviews.Title: Not a good purchase
Reviews.Author: McKenna
Reviews.Content: When the phone arrived, The glass screen was coming up and was loose on the right corner of the phone. I sent the phone back for a refund.

Reviews.Title: unsatisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Toney Cyril Moore
Reviews.Content: Had phone for only a couple of weeks and already started. having problems with the phone freezing up and doing things on it's own. Here it is 3 weeks later and it won't charge up nor keep a charge .

Reviews.Title: Battery Assult
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: Battery Assult, provides excellent customer service. I will buy through them in the future. We had a few problems with the phone and they resolved it timely.ThanksLynn

Reviews.Title: Well the device it's self is nice however
Reviews.Author: ABDULKAREM ABDULRAHMAN ALI AL-DHABEI
Reviews.Content: Well the device it's self is nice however the the device wasn't as shown on the pic's ! it has scratches on sides that wasn't shown on the pics !

Reviews.Title: Registered as Lost or Stolen
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: bought this phone and tried to hook it up through verizon who would not hook it up because the esn was registered as lost or stolen.

Reviews.Title: incredible 2 issues
Reviews.Author: thomas cook
Reviews.Content: This phone is a piece of crap first tried to text found out some of the touch screen is not working. I then tried to make a call only to find out that it only works on speaker. I don't think this is a new phone it seems like it is reconditioned. I thought something was not right when it arrived in a plain box that said mobile phone instead of a htc droid box. I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Great phone. I'm still learning the finer details of it.
Reviews.Author: L.Dioriø
Reviews.Content: I'm not a phone geek-- yet.  But I'm leaning all I can as fast as I can. This phone has really impressed me; of course I've had less than impressive phones up until now.But, this was recommended for me by a current owner who loved it and knew how to use all the features. He also recommended using Page Plus for service to avoid getting reamed by Verizon charges.So far I am extremely happy with how it works, what it offers, how it looks and feels.I was happy to see only good reviews for the HTC incredible 2 in every search before I bought it. I was told I could have found used ones for about $100 on Craigs list, but for the additional $50 I got it new without having to do the unpredictable secondary market thing.

Reviews.Title: malfunctions and only in week 2.
Reviews.Author: andrea cunningham
Reviews.Content: Purchased phone 'new'. First problem: whenever l open my photo gallery, alert message keeps popping up stating the SD card has been removed. You can't hardly hear others on the receiving end or phone when it rings. Will not allow me to download any documents, state downloads failed, the features are a joke in comparison to the Samsung galaxy. Was able to use my phone's internet before l got this phone, now every time l connect after a few seconds and it keeps saying the connection had dropped.

Reviews.Title: anyone has idea
Reviews.Author: silta
Reviews.Content: just purchased this phone, I guess don't know how to use the features. it locks automatically when I'm on the phone talking, the screen gets dark & can't see the bottons to turn off or end call. Turn the power botton on, few seconds later, it turns off again, may be screen goes to sleeping mode?? anyone has any idea if the phone is defect or it's setting issue.thanks
